document_data.name: Wildwind
document_data.mainbody: '''''Wildwind''''' was a [[wild magic]] [[conjuration]] [[spell]] used by [[wild mage]]s.
document_data.Effects: This spell created a wall of multicolored lights measuring {{SI|150|ft|long=yes}} long in a location of the caster's choosing. The caster could move the wall or even rotate it if they wished, but once set into motion the wall could not be stopped unless the spell ended. The wall harmed any creature it touched, but contacting a wizard attempting to cast a spell would instantly trigger a [[wild surge]]. Discharging a [[magic item]] would also trigger a wild surge.
document_data.Components: This spell required only [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components to cast.
